To confirm the above, I was unable to reproduce this in HEAD (I was not using 
activities).

The NPE in this case was caused by a missing else statement.  It has since been
fixed.  However, if you open the CVS perspective without the Team activity, the
perspective is empty.  I'll put in the call to enabled activities for a given
perspective.

Marking this as fixed and opening Bug 51052 to address the general activation
point problem.
